alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Horry; Marion; Marlboro; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 8:06PM EDT until April 05 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Florence County in northeastern South Carolina... Dillon County in northeastern South Carolina... Southeastern Darlington County in northeastern South Carolina... Northwestern Horry County in northeastern South Carolina... Marion County in northeastern South Carolina... South central Marlboro County in northeastern South Carolina... Northwestern Williamsburg County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 805 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Hope, or 9 miles south of Florence, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Florence, Marion, Dillon, Lake City, Darlington, Mullins, Timmonsville, Latta, Pamplico, Quinby, Sellers, Blue Brick, Brownsville, Darlington Raceway, Rains, New Hope, Galivants Ferry, Hyman, Effingham and Oak Grove. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for northeastern South Carolina. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for northeastern South Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Horry; Marion; Marlboro; Williamsburg
